text:
When using Apache 2.x as a front end to Tomcat 5, pdf files are not served to
the client when served by byte ranges (206).  The transmission aborts.
creator: mickyw@williamsonhouse.com

text: Is this using Trunk?  Only 2.1.x contains a built in mod_proxy_ajp
creator: chip@force-elite.com
nick@webthing.com
text: Underspecified report: what AJP connector?  No reply to Paul's question; likely mooted by proxy updates in 2.2.
